Interface UserInformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserInformationChunkImpl, UserInformationImpl

    public interface UserInformation
    Created by Martina on 14.5.2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCurrentUserId()
      Gets current user id from config file
      java.time.LocalDate getCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate()
      Get last time we updated database, should be used to get rid of duplicates
      long getUserId(java.lang.String name)
      Gets id associated with name, if does not exist, create new id
      boolean isCurrentUserAdmin()
      Check if current user role is admin
      void saveCurrentUserInformation(long id, boolean isAdmin)
      Saves information about logged user into config, used directly after login procedure
      void saveCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate()
      Always has to be preceded by saveCurrentUserInformation, saves today as the last day of update

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentUserId

        long getCurrentUserId()
        Gets current user id from config file
        Returns:
        user id

      • isCurrentUserAdmin

        boolean isCurrentUserAdmin()
        Check if current user role is admin
        Returns:
        true if admin

      • getCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate

        java.time.LocalDate getCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate()
        Get last time we updated database, should be used to get rid of duplicates
        Returns:
        time of last update, if info in config missing returns LocalDate.MIN

      • saveCurrentUserInformation

        void saveCurrentUserInformation(long id,
                                boolean isAdmin)
        Saves information about logged user into config, used directly after login procedure
        Parameters:
        id - userId
        isAdmin - true if user role is admin

      • saveCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate

        void saveCurrentUserLastTimeOfUpdate()
        Always has to be preceded by saveCurrentUserInformation, saves today as the last day of update

        Gets id associated with name, if does not exist, create new id

        Returns:
